```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("palmerpenguins")
```
```{r}
#A
#f(x)=x^2 at x=3
fx <- expression(x ^ 2)
df_dx <- D(fx, 'x')
df_dx
x <- 3
eval(df_dx)
```
```{r}

#P(a)=2(3a+2)^4âˆ’5 at a=1.2
```
